summary: Replace sunglare texture with a blank texture. Useful for ENB with godrays
descriptionHtml:
From ENB v0.113 we have godrays now.
This mod is quite simple: Replace sunglare texture with a blank texture. It is very useful for ENB configurations, like mine [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20050]Vivida ENB[/url], with sunrays support

* INSTALLATION *

Download the file, unpack and place the folder \"textures\" in your data folder. Overwrite existing files if necessary.

* UNISTALLATION *

Just delete the files.

Enjoy!
author: MannyGT
